ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I expect there will be someone somewhere who will train in these skills, although you may need to raise your standing within their guild before they will
ygData.messageBody:
I expect there will be someone somewhere who will train in these skills,
although you may need to raise your standing within their guild before they
will consider it. I would expect a thieves guild would train in Sneak, but
they will not train any non thief until you have gained their favour (don't
ask me how).

Of course, I could be wrong, and it may be that you just have to keep
practising over and over. Sense Heading has taken me a while to build
without training. You only gain in the skill with success, and early
success is rare, but as your skill increases, so do the successes and the
builds.

Itan the Whistler
